class.name: LowPassFilter
class.doc: y[n] = y[n-1] + a(x[n] - y[n-1]), where x=input, y=output, n=sample number, a = dt / (RC + dt) http://www.dsplog.com/2007/12/02/digital-implementation-of-rc-low-pass-filter/ y[n] = y[n-1] + k(x[n-1] - y[n-1]), where k=1/(RC) Lower k = tighter frequency response Will need to convert this to work with seconds, and not sample numbers.
